name: Introduction to Gender & Sexuality Studies
description: An introduction to the field of Gender & Sexuality Studies, including an overview of relevant theories, concepts, and debates.

name: Queer Theory
description: An exploration of the main concepts of Queer Theory, including an analysis of its relevance to Gender & Sexuality Studies.

name: LGBTQ+ Histories
description: An exploration of the histories of LGBTQ+ people, including the ways in which these histories have been shaped by politics, culture, and social movements.

name: LGBTQ+ Identities and Social Movements
description: An exploration of the social movements and identities associated with LGBTQ+ people, including an analysis of how these have evolved over time.

name: Advanced Topics in LGBTQ+ Studies
description: A study of advanced topics in LGBTQ+ Studies, including a focus on the intersections between gender, sexuality, race, class, and disability.
